abstract: The Senate’s committee on homeland security and New York State’s top financial regulator, Benjamin Lawsky, are starting broad investigations of shortcomings in the oversight of upstart virtual currencies like bitcoin.
snippet: The Senate’s committee on homeland security and New York State’s top financial regulator, Benjamin Lawsky, are starting broad investigations of shortcomings in the oversight of upstart virtual currencies like bitcoin.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 8:55 p.m. | State and federal officials are starting broad investigations into shortcomings in the oversight of upstart virtual currencies like bitcoin.

headline.main: New York and U.S. Open Investigations Into Bitcoins
headline.print_headline: New York and U.S. Open Investigations Into Bitcoins
